title: Oven Temp: Over/under estimate for R.S.

content.question: Is your approximation in part (b) an underestimate or an overestimate of the average temperature? Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: Is your approximation in part (b) an underestimate or an overestimate of the average temperature? Give a reason for your answer.

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
